      Type Parameters:

      Parameters:

      Returns:

      Throws:

    • getRandomColor

      public static Color getRandomColor()
      Generates a random color.
      Returns:
      A random Color object.

    • getRandomColor

      public static Color getRandomColor(int min, int max)
      Generates a random color with each RGB component constrained between the specified minimum and maximum values.
      Parameters:
      min - the minimum value for each RGB component (inclusive)
      max - the maximum value for each RGB component (inclusive)
      Returns:
      a random Color object with RGB values within the specified range

    • getRandomColor

      public static Color getRandomColor(int max)
      Generates a random color with the specified maximum RGB values.
      Parameters:
      max - the maximum (inclusive) value for the red, green, and blue components of the color.
      Returns:
      a random Color object with RGB values up to the specified maximum.

    • getRandomColor

      public static Color getRandomColor(int rMin, int rMax, int gMin, int gMax, int bMin, int bMax)
      Generates a random color with RGB values within the specified ranges.
      Parameters:
      rMin - the minimum value for the red component (inclusive)
      rMax - the maximum value for the red component (inclusive)
      gMin - the minimum value for the green component (inclusive)
      gMax - the maximum value for the green component (inclusive)
      bMin - the minimum value for the blue component (inclusive)
      bMax - the maximum value for the blue component (inclusive)
      Returns:
      a Color object with random RGB values within the specified ranges

    • getRandomColor

      public static Color getRandomColor(int rMax, int gMax, int bMax)
      Generates a random color with the specified maximum values for the red, green, and blue components.
      Parameters:
      rMax - the maximum value for the red component (0 to 255)
      gMax - the maximum value for the green component (0 to 255)
      bMax - the maximum value for the blue component (0 to 255)
      Returns:
      a random Color object with the specified maximum RGB values
